name: RAD-sketball
description:
Mushroom Cloud City: a post apocalyptic peepee stain writhing in its own hubris after the fallout engulfed all of North America. Residents here don't complain, though. The rad sickness doesn't get to them. They love the stuff.

I hear there are still some bomb fields out in the wasteland. If you can manage, maybe you should clear them out and watch that Geiger counter tick up. Just don't go losing your other arm.

CONTROLS:

Wait until the directional arrow is pointing towards the bombs and click to fire.
